Recipe.title: Honey Butter
Recipe.Description: There are many dishes that taste good with butter, that also taste good with honey. (Corn Bread, Navajo Fry Bread, etc.) In Utah, it is very common to serve Honey Butter with these.

section.instruction: In a small bowl, mix ingredients.

Notes.note:
Make sure Butter is softened before starting this recipe. This is best done by leaving a stick on the counter for an hour or so.
Use caution if you choose to soften in a microwave. Do not melt the Butter! This will just make everything a coagulated ugly mess.

Modifications.modification: Feel free to increase or decrease the amount of honey to your own taste.
